lyrics.text:
Ko Sione ne sio ‘a e kakai ne mape’e
‘I he ‘ao he Lami, mo hiva pehē
“ʻOku taau mo e Lami ne mate tāmate’i
Ke Ne maʻu ‘a e kolōlia ai pē.
‘Ēmeni.”

Na’e ‘i ai ‘a e Mātu’a Uofulu-mā-fā,
‘O nau tā ‘enau ha’ape mo hiva kalanga,
“‘Oku taau mo e Lami etc.

‘Āngelo toko lahi na’e kau ‘i he hiva,
Ko e hiva fo’ou he fa’ahinga ko ia,
“ʻOku taau mo e Lami etc.

Pea toki pā mai hangē tofu ha mana
‘A e hiva ‘a e hōsitē mei he ‘atā na,
“ʻOku taau mo e Lami etc.

Ka ko hai te ne lava ke fakamatala
‘A e ngaahi fa’ahinga na’e hiki mavava?
“‘Oku taau mo e Lami etc.

He fa’ahinga ne mate ka kuo mo’ui,
Ne nau hiva ‘a e tu’utai ‘a honau Huhu’i.
“‘Oku taau mo e Lami etc.

Ne’ine’i ‘enau hiva mo kalakalanga,
Kuo tau ni ki monū ‘a e tonu ki mala.
“‘Oku taau mo e Lami, etc.

Ko e tokamoekafa kuo ‘ata’atā,
Ko e fakatau’aki ‘a e ta’ata’a na.
“‘Oku taau moe Lami, etc.

Me’a Mo’ui ‘e fa na’a nau tali ʻĒmeni.
Ki he hiva ne fai ‘e he fu’u ‘ūniveesi.
“‘Oku taau moe Lami ne mate tāmate’i
Ke ne ma’u ‘a e kolōlia ai pē.
ʻĒmeni.”
